response: given the concerning changes in your mother's condition, i would highly recommend that you take her to the emergency room (er) as soon as possible. she might have suffered some nerve damage or at the very least, a severe sprain in the neck muscles due to the fall from her bed. it's essential to get her checked promptly so that the required treatment can be initiated at the earliest. you can contact her primary care physician and neurologist as well to keep them informed about her current situation. this is not a condition that can be managed at home without proper medical care.
